messages.body: Apple CEO says optimistic on U.S.-China trade talks $AAPL $BZUN $YELP $SQ $STAA $MSFT https://mobile.reuters.com/article/amp/idUSKCN1LY1YW

links.title: Apple CEO says optimistic on U.S.-China trade talks
links.description: Tue Sep 18, 2018 / 9:56 AM EDT (Reuters) - Apple Inc Chief Executive Tim Cook, whose products have been spared from new U.S. tariffs imposed on Chinese goods, said on Tuesday he was optimistic that the United States and China will eventually work through their trade differences.

links.description: Look, I'll be upfront with you -- I've dabbled a "few" times in drugs & alcohol over the three decades I've been alive. Yah, it's fun. College is experimental, don't hate me. But anyways, remember the opening to The Wolf of Wall Street? You know, the scene where he blows some china off a stripper a**...
